dc_title_s: Geological map of Michigan; by Alexander Winchell.; Geil's map of Michigan
dc_description_s: Entered according to act of Congress in the year 1865 by Samuel Geil... Includes "Epitome of the geology of Michigan," population table, and inset of Isle Royale. 1 map: col.; 44 x 43 cm., folded in cover 14 x 10 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
